result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
State moves to dismiss and read in.  Defendant plead to charges in 15 CF 367, 15 CF 165 and 15 CF 60.  Motion granted.
Minutes.
to counsel from ADA Prost re:  State's proposed offer.

ADDRESS INFO for Cody A. SPENCER
Current: 911 N. 9th Street, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 09-23-2015)
Prior: 720 N. 5th St., Manitowoc, WI 54220
Defendant's Demand for Discovery and Inspection.

Not guilty plea.  Jury Calendar.   Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 07-23-15 at 8:50 a.m.   Plea date is set for 10-14-15 at 9:30 a.m.   
Minutes.

State moves t amend the victim's name to Richard Zachow.   Motion granted.   Defendant requests counsel and is referred to the public defender.  Initial appearance is reset to 07-13-15 at 1:30 p.m.   Bail is set at $500.00 recognizance bond with the condition that defendant must report to the Two Rivers Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours.   Bail furnished.  
Minutes.

RE:  Dana Boehm, on 03-26-15.
Initial appearance is set for 07-06-15 at 1:30 p.m.
